\vspace{0.5cm}

We will prove that the arithmetic progression $\equiv {ell} \pmod{{k}}$ contains infinitely many primes. Equivalently, we will see that there are infinitely many primes of the form ${k}n+{ell}$, $n\geqslant0$.
